entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 10. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
